hero.title: FAQ
hero.subtitle: Find answers to the most frequently asked questions

items.question: How can I book a room?
items.answer: You can book directly on our website by clicking the “Book now” button on each room page, or contact us easily via WhatsApp.

items.question: Can I cancel or modify my reservation?
items.answer: Yes, you can cancel or modify your reservation free of charge up to 48 hours before arrival.

items.question: What are the check-in and check-out times?
items.answer: Check-in is available from 2:00 PM and check-out must be completed before 11:00 AM.

items.question: Is breakfast included?
items.answer: Yes, breakfast is included in all our rooms at no extra cost.

items.question: Are pets allowed?
items.answer: Unfortunately, pets are not allowed for the comfort of all guests.

items.question: Do you have parking?
items.answer: Yes, free and secure parking is available.

items.question: Is Wi-Fi available?
items.answer: Yes, high-speed Wi-Fi is available for free in all rooms and common areas.
